titleStmt.title: A discourse on the history of the whole world dedicated to His Royal Highness, the Dauphin, and explicating the continuance of religion with the changes of states and empires, from the creation till the reign of Charles the Great / written originally in French by James Benigne Bossuet ... ; faithfully Englished.
Discours sur l'histoire universelle. English
titleStmt.author: Bossuet, Jacques Bénigne, 1627-1704.

notesStmt.note: First ed. of this translation of: Discours sur l'histoire universelle. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
